sentence.Network_en: At one point a bird trilled in the Conservatory.

sentence.Network_en: A conservatory offers the perfect excuse to let your imagination run riot.

sentence.Network_en: The conservatory will get very hot in summer unless shading is used.
sentence.Network_cn: 夏天如果不用遮光罩的话，暖房会变得特别热。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (denoting something that preserves): from late Latin conservatorium, from conservare 'to preserve' (see conserve)

entry.def: A conservatory is a room with glass walls and a glass roof, which is attached to a house. People often grow plants  in a conservatory.

entry.tran: 音乐学院;音乐专科学校
entry.def: A conservatory is an institution where musicians are trained.

means.word_mean: 1. the faculty and students of a school specializing in one of the fine arts
2. a schoolhouse with special facilities for fine arts
3. a greenhouse in which plants are arranged in a pleasing manner

auth_sentence.content: Kassinger says her conservatory has grown in unexpected ways.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"场所,地点"; 2. 表形容词,"有……性质的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: anticipate预期+atory有……性质的→anticipatory
condemn谴责+atory有……性质的→adj.非难的,处罚的
defame诽谤+atory有……性质的→adj.诽谤的
exclam=exclaim叫喊+atory有……性质的→adj.叫喊的,感叹的,惊叹的
explan=explain解释,说明+atory有……性质的→adj.解释[性]的,说明的
mand命令+atory有……性质的→adj.命令的,强迫的
oblige迫使,责成+atory有……性质的→adj.强制性的,义务的
propiti=propitiate讨好+atory有……性质的→adj.讨好的,调解的
conserve保存,保全+atory场所,地点→n.温室,音乐学院
labor劳动+atory场所,地点→劳动的地方→实验室
lav洗,冲+atory场所→冲洗的地方→洗手间
observe观察+atory场所,地点→用来观察的场所
purg纯洁+atory场所,地点→炼狱是人们净化灵魂之地

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"……的"; 2. 表名词,"场所,范围"

stems_affixes.word_buile: minat威吓+ory……的→adj.威胁的,恫吓的
obligate有责任的;使负义务+ory……的→adj.强制性的,义务的
olfact闻,嗅+ory……的→adj.嗅觉的
per全部+empt拿走+ory……的→全部拿走→专横的
re反+fract打碎+ory……的→反过来打碎→宁愿折碎了也不弯
cremat焚烧+ory场所,范围→n.火葬场 adj.火葬的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 纹章,纹章学,兵工厂,军械库
stems_affixes.word_buile: arm武器+ory场所,范围→n.纹章,纹章学,兵工厂,军械库

cremat焚烧+ory场所,范围→n.火葬场 adj.火葬的
